sense.def:
To be doomed to an unpleasant or undesirable experience
pomeni vedeti, da nas bo prizadelo nekaj neprijetnega ali nezaželenega.

seg.quote: He was doomed to be killed in a car crash.

sense.def:
Kar je
doomed
, bo gotovo spodletelo ali pa bo uničeno.

seg.quote: They informed the Prime Minister that his government was doomed.
